TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: I wish I could donate to this. Can I at least get my name in the card? Or something?
Actually, why don't we add a card for them with all of our names in it?
:wink:The card will weigh more than the pizza, but wy not
i havent herd back from Rowsdower, but the idea of pizza isnt off the table just yet. one way or another well get it figured out.
I've gotten on da hype train!!!
